package:
ros_driver_base
This library contains a generic implementation of (i) timeout-based non-blocking I/O and (ii) packet-reassembly code. It allows to write a driver that will timeout on read and/or write, and to generically do packet extraction in the I/O stream.
Gabriel Arjones LGPL v2 or later
